answers.answer: I had that happen at about 27 weeks. Dr wasn't worried because I passed the blood test 2 weeks prior but planned to monitor. Next appt at 29 weeks was fine.  I drank a soda the night before my appt at 27 weeks which i dont usually do and hadn't had as much water since it was 8am so Dr said that may have player a role
Expelling sugar? Just be careful what your eating just in case. It doesn't hurt to be extra cautious. Good luck.
Thanks ladies.. My midwife seemed not concerned but doctor sent me for blood work

question: I passed the gestational diabetes test however am now 34 weeks and just got told I'm spilling sugar in my urine. I'm going for follow up blood work. Has anyone had this?
title: spilling sugar in urine
